subject: JUnit testing mbeans
msgSnippet: Hi, I am trying to test the createService method of an mbean as it contains code to load the persisted attributes from the database. I am trying to obtain an
messageBody:
Hi,
I am trying to test the createService method of an mbean as it
contains code to load the persisted attributes from the database. I am
trying to obtain an instance of the mbean server before I invoke the
"createService" method on it. However the following bit of code within
the setUp() does not return any mbeans, as the exception shown
following the code

mbs = (MBeanServer)MBeanServerFactory.findMBeanServer(null).get(0);

Exception:

java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index: 0, Size: 0

I am running the test through Eclipse.

Can anyone throw a light on this problem?

Thanks in Advance

RM
